detail: Took first CS course in grade 10 and learned about basic javascript coding.
Took the grade 11 university level CS course and learned about more advanced javascript methods.
Took grade 12 university level CS course and learned about how to code and make web apps using python
Worked part-time for elections Canada during the 2025 Federal Election. Job was to input the votes into the system so that they could be totalled and displayed.
